item.description:
Jimmies of Savin Rock West Haven, CT... Established. 1925...
Best in Waterfront Dining

Well, here we are ...the end of summer is upon us! We're bidding farewell in a big way at The King Of Seafood...Jimmie's!!! If you are looking for something to do...you just found it! Come out and join us. It's delicious and it's fun!!!

Come satisfy your appetite with the huge portions you’ll only find at Jimmies Galley. The family-owned-and-operated seafood restaurant is a West Haven institution known for its fresh seafood-the fried clams here are #1- and the huge prime rib cuts are beyond belief. In fact, the portions at the West Haven restaurant are so big, no one leaves without a carryout (doggie) bag. Ruff-Ruff

If the weather is fine and we can manage it, we, Mike and I, will be on their new patio...look for us there as you arrive. If not, we will be at the bar inside. Situated on the ocean, it's fun to come early and walk the boardwalk, or just people-watch. Mike and I will be there early to put in our reservation,  so feel free to join us and do your thing.

Yes, it is a little bit of a drive but so worth it! So, come on out and make a 'last of the summer" memory!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Terri, or Mike...cell 203-808-5829 or 203-768-8561

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: JIMMIE'S OF SAVIN ROCK...See You In September!!!
